ygData.subject: Re: Bard Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Simple answer . . . you can t sing more than one at a time. To figure out why, trying singing Happy Birthday and Three Blind Mice at the same time to your
ygData.messageBody:
Simple answer . . . you can't sing more than one at a time.

To figure out why, trying singing Happy Birthday and Three Blind Mice at
the same time to your friends and family. If you succeed, call Verant and
tell them EQ is unrealistic . . . :-)

-Musil

At 05:51 PM 4/22/99 , you wrote:
>From: edscanni@...
>
>Pray, fellow singers of songs, I am but the 7th circle, and while most
glib, talented, and quite handsome (and I say this most humbly), I do not
know how to sing more than one song ata a time!
>Please, friends can anyone enlighten me?
> Many Thanks,
> Scanna The Bard
> Freeport
>
